type.description:
## Exposed To Sky

---



[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/exposed_to_sky)

Checks whether the block is exposed to the sky.

Type ID: `origins:exposed_to_sky`




---

### Examples

```json
"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:exposed_to_sky"
}
```
